This is a rest day. Prioritize relaxation and recovery.

The majority of this run should be at your usual easy pace, but do 3-5 reps of 30-60 second efforts at your goal race pace in the final mile of the run.                        This will allow you to maintain your top-end fitness as you taper toward race day.
1.5 mile warm up followed by 5  reps of approximately 60 second hill sprints. Finish with 1.5 mile cool down

The majority of this run should be at your usual easy pace, but do 3-5 reps of 30-60 second efforts at your goal race pace in the final mile of the run.                        This will allow you to maintain your top-end fitness as you taper toward race day.
This is a rest day. Prioritize relaxation and recovery.
Race day has arrived! Be patient, stick to your plan, and trust in your training. Good luck!
